title.rendered: Introducing Video Annotations for Creative Collaboration

content.rendered:
Leaving feedback on videos just got even easier. Now add visual context to your timestamped comments with Video Markups. Spend less time describing issues by pointing to them using annotations that appear over videos.

Draw over any point in a video. Choose from four different drawing tools and five colors. Add multiple annotated comments to the same frame. With Video Markups, each moment within a video can serve as a drawing board for identifying problems, brainstorming solutions, and offering feedback.

Viewers can jump to annotated comments from the seek bar or the comment section. Selecting a timestamped comment pauses the video and automatically displays linked annotations over the video.

Use Video Markups to leave feedback for teammates, highlight areas of interest for clients, or scribble helpful notes for your students.

The feature is available for free today for Jumpshare users on all plans.
